    • Data Dictionary - Venues

Load cbb venue information

Source: R/load_venues.R
load_venues.Rd

Loads information about college basketball venues.

Usage

load_venues()

Value

a dataframe of information about college basketball venues.

See also

https://john-b-edwards.github.io/cbbreadr/articles/dictionary_venues.html for a web version of the data dictionary

dictionary_venues for the data dictionary as bundled within the package

Issues with this data should be filed here: https://github.com/john-b-edwards/cbbd-data/issues

Examples

# \donttest{
load_venues()
#>         id source_id                                               name
#>      <int>    <char>                                             <char>
#>   1:  1237      2292                                Cancha Del Atletico
#>   2:  1258      2566                           St. George's High School
#>   3:  1621      6289                              CARSA Performance Gym
#>   4:  1500      5287                                        Youth Arena
#>   5:  1501      5288                                    Carioca Arena 1
#>  ---                                                                   
#> 968:   409     10886                     Mohegan Sun Arena Wilkes-Barre
#> 969:    94     10887                                  John Glaser Arena
#> 970:    30     10949                      John Wooden Family Fieldhouse
#> 971:   401     10970 Florida State College at Jacksonville South Campus
#> 972:   410     10971                    Sturrus Sports & Fitness Center
#>                       city  state       country
#>                     <char> <char>        <char>
#>   1:               Tucuman   <NA>     Argentina
#>   2:              Freeport   <NA>          <NA>
#>   3:              Victoria     BC        Canada
#>   4:        Rio De Janeiro   <NA>        Brazil
#>   5:        Rio De Janeiro   <NA>        Brazil
#>  ---                                           
#> 968: Wilkes Barre Township     PA United States
#> 969:          Philadelphia     PA United States
#> 970:                 Xenia     OH United States
#> 971:          Jacksonville     FL United States
#> 972:          Grand Rapids     MI United States
# }
